stripped_text: Subroutine Look at the top 3 cards of R&D and either arrange them in any order or shuffle R&D. You may draw 1 card. Subroutine You may trash 1 card in HQ. If you do, trash 1 resource. Trash Sadaka.
text:
[subroutine] Look at the top 3 cards of R&D and either arrange them in any order or shuffle R&D. You may draw 1 card.
[subroutine] You may trash 1 card in HQ. If you do, trash 1 resource. Trash Sadaka.
title: Sadaka
